en-CA.summary: Leaving the house and need to quickly know how many bikes are at your closest station? Ask Bike Finder!
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask bike finder to reset my account
en-CA.name: Bike Finder for Barcelona
en-CA.description: Bike is here to get you a quick update before you head out, should you go for a bike or head straight for the metro? It works with Bicing to bring you the status of your closest stations, in a quick summary.

es-ES.summary: Quieres el estado de las estanciones de bicing mas cercanas? Aqui las tienes!
examplePhrases: Alexa, pidele a barcelona bicis que restablezca mi cuenta
es-ES.name: Buscador de bicis para Barcelona
es-ES.description: Esta skill esta hecho para que puedes saber instant√°neamente el estado de tu estacion de Bicing mas cercana.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: The launch intent is the main function of this application. It is quite specifically for users in Barcelona. There is a second intent, ResetAccount, which exists for if the device location is incorrect when the user first starts the app. They can then reset and it will get their location a second time.
